author: Adrian Collins
description:
Artist Carlos Diaz is a major part of the Grimdark Magazine team, his dark and dynamic style adaptable across fantasy and sci-fi and splashed across most of our publications since 2019. He’s also been a central artist for our first ever quarterly magazine print edition, releasing in January of 2026, and absolutely jam packed with […]

The post Carlos Diaz: Bringing grimdark SFF to life appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Carlos Diaz: Bringing grimdark SFF to life
